description:
Chalk up your cue and prepare to hit the baize, in this deep yet pocket-sized pool simulation.

In 9-Ball mode, simply try to knock the numbered balls into the holes. With no limit on the number of shots, it's perfect for beginners.

When you want a challenge, try Pocket mode. Work your way up from rookie to world class champ. You'll also need to prove yourself with trick shots too!
name: Side Pocket
